h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: Each region has a number of Meditation Spots to uncover and every time you take a quiet moment to reflect, you’ll gain Sparks. If you want to unlock all those skills quickly, it’s worth tracking down every Meditation Spot and enjoying a moment of calm.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '10\. Meditation Spots Grant Skill Points'.
The content is as follows:
Each region has a number of Meditation Spots to uncover and every time you take a quiet moment to reflect, you’ll gain Sparks. If you want to unlock all those skills quickly, it’s worth tracking down every Meditation Spot and enjoying a moment of calm.
